long_description: New to paddling and ready to go full-steam ahead? The Dagger Axis 12 Kayak with Skeg offers versatility that keeps performing right along with your increasing level of skill on mellow waters. 12 ft. length maintains speed and enhances ease of motion when you're looking to cover water, and an integrated beam stiffens the hull to keep you in control when turning. Stable hull inspires confidence for beginners, and defined chines enhance maneuverability. Rotomolded polyethylene construction offers performance, responsiveness and rugged durability. Height-adjustable, drop-down skeg enhances tracking and reduces the tendency of the kayak to weathercock in strong winds and currents. Soft foam seat features a height-adjustable backrest, leg lifters, and thigh pads in the cockpit. Roomy cockpit makes it easy for large paddlers to enter kayak, and sliding foot pegs lock in to adjust the fit for multiple paddlers. Mesh pocket attached to the bow deck offers secures storage for small accessories, and it's within easy reach. Rear hatch provides enough storage for an overnight trip. 55 lb. weight.
short_description: New to paddling and ready to go full-steam ahead? The Dagger Axis 12 Kayak with Skeg offers versatility that keeps performing right along with your increasing level of skill on mellow waters.
